abilities.name: Tainted Narthecium
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, in your Command phase, you can return 1 destroyed Bodyguard model to that unit.

abilities.name: Inflamed Infections
abilities.rule: At the start of the Fight phase, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model. Until the end of the phase, each time this model makes an attack that targets that unit, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit. If that unit is Below Half-strength, an unmodified Hit roll of 4+ scores a Critical Hit instead.
